text: The Texican is a 1966 American Spanish western movie directed by Lesley Selander and starring Audie Murphy, Broderick Crawford, Diana Lorys, Luz MÃ¡rquez, Anthony Casas, Antonio Molino Rojo, Aldo Sambrell. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. == Other websites == * * * Category:1966 movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Spanish Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Lesley Selander Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The Texican
